underlying_goal: To create a specification or plan for an LLM to help with belly fat reduction.
primary_success: Providing a structured, multi-faceted plan covering diet, exercise, and lifestyle, including specific templates and red flags.
brief_summary: The user requested a spec for an LLM to help reduce belly fat. Claude produced a detailed life plan covering diet (caloric deficit, protein), exercise (strength training, walking), and lifestyle factors (sleep, stress). The plan included a sample weekly structure and key metrics to track.
